justification: Understands B’s TE has tough playoff matchups and WR room is volatile, so a steadier WR could appeal. However, it ignores B’s reliance on expert rankings (TE3 vs WR4 value), B’s preference for possession/target volume and schedule for the incoming WR, and A’s motivations/needs. The trade is plausible (B has TE depth; A needs a TE), but the rationale is thin and one-sided.
